remarks: Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
statement:
elabf.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
elabf.2 $e |- A e. _V $.
elabf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
elabf $p |- ( A e. { x | ph } <-> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
